args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem complex_abs_exp (z : ℂ) : |Complex.exp z| = Real.exp z.re := by sorry

args.query: mathlib4 Complex abs exp |e^z| = e^{Re z} theorem name Complex.abs_exp mathlib4 GitHub

args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem complex_abs_exp (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.exp z) = Real.exp z.re := by sorry
